media:group.media:title: The REAL Reason Madden Sucks
media:group.media:description:
Madden 23 recently dropped, and it faces the same fate as all recent Maddens… it’s hot garbage. 

This begs the question, why hasn’t EA made a better game yet? The answer lies in competition and exclusive license.
